title: 3 card HOF lot with Hindu, PB, and SC 350-460 fact#25
author: Luke

posts.post_title: 3 card HOF lot with Hindu, PB, and SC 350-460 fact#25
posts.post_content:
Need to get some funds back into Paypal, so I'm offering this lot for $300 shipped.

Both Willis are obviously low grade, but still present pretty well.  Bender is VG or so, although the tobacco staining is pretty severe.  I don't mind this, but I know some people do.  Thanks for looking.
